generated_class_comment:
/**
 * The BeanPiatto class represents a food item in a menu. It contains information such as the ID, name, price, and menu ID of the food item.
 * This class provides methods to retrieve and set the values of these attributes, as well as constructors to create new instances of BeanPiatto objects.
 * 
 * Main functionalities include:
 * - Retrieving and setting the ID of the food item
 * - Retrieving and setting the name of the food item
 * - Retrieving and setting the price of the food item
 * - Retrieving and setting the menu ID of the food item
 * 
 * The class also includes constructors to initialize new BeanPiatto objects with specified values or default values.
 * 
 * Overall behavior:
 * - The BeanPiatto class encapsulates the data related to a food item and provides methods to interact with this data.
 * - It allows for the creation of new food items with specific attributes and enables the manipulation of these attributes.
 * - The class is designed to be used in a menu management system where food items need to be represented and managed.
 */
